Diagnosis.Name: Fred
Diagnosis.Text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

Diagnosis.Name: Samantha
Diagnosis.Text: Kindness is the language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.

Diagnosis.Name: Jones
Diagnosis.Text: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.

Diagnosis.Name: Skylar
Diagnosis.Text:
GET OUT NOW!
NONE OF YOU ARE SAFE!

Diagnosis.Name: Shami
Diagnosis.Text: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to reform (or pause and reflect).

Diagnosis.Name: Shamu
Diagnosis.Text: Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well.

Diagnosis.Name: Gunda
Diagnosis.Text: I have never let my schooling interfere with my education.

Diagnosis.Name: Thor
Diagnosis.Text: Substitute 'damn' every time you're inclined to write 'very;' your editor will delete it and the writing will be just as it should be.

Diagnosis.Name: Heinrich
Diagnosis.Text: God created war so that Americans would learn geography.

Diagnosis.Name: Gautama
Diagnosis.Text: When I was a boy of 14, my father was so ignorant I could hardly stand to have the old man around. But when I got to be 21, I was astonished at how much the old man had learned in seven years.
